name: Girls Attack! Join & Clash
description:
Who runs the world? Girls! It's high time to prove it, Sister! Download Girls Attack now and play one of the craziest join & clash running games ever!

The Girl Attack gameplay is super simple! You should run and gather as many besties as possible. The more girls you collect, the easier you'll defeat the laddish Macho Boss. Tap and kick him out!

Watch out and don’t break your high heels or long nails overcoming various barriers on your way! Avoid buzzsaws, wrecking balls and other dangerous obstacles to keep all the girls safe and sound!

Unlock dozens of cool costumes to give yourself a complete makeover – from head to toe. Dress like you're going to meet your ex!

Why you’ll love Girls Attack:

- Tons of real fun
- One-finger control
- Bright graphics
- Addictive gameplay

Can you form a girl group big enough to fight all the dudes? Show ’em the real girl power! Play the running & fighting game right now and change the rules!
